topics.body:
"@Kaz":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a20ddb63687247e500127e#post_55a20ddb63687247e500127e
oic

yeah doing songs by hand is much easier than putting notes in a machine i find, you have a much stronger sense of melody and a bit more control of where you want things to go

i use fl studios and have the option to put notes wherever the fuck and i think that my music reflects my struggle trying to comprehend with what i have to work with
